This day in Alta's history.

1930Livestock technician opened in the Chamber
1944Oyrot-Tura opened the first unit.
1944The Guardian of the Etherine Sémen Tartak, the price of his own life, destroyed a tank attack of fascists. The title of the Union of Soviet Socialist Republic
1965Blood transfusion points are open in Onguday and Torochak districts
1990In Gorn-Altiske, there is a system of film screening through a network of commercial videos.
2004Anton Yudanov summoned Vladimir Girinovski, leader of the LDR, for calling the Altai language “warski” in teledebats.
